title: Workaround MathEval's tokenizer problem
message:
Workaround MathEval's tokenizer problem

MathEval's tokenizer failed with:

    ((1 + 2) + 3)

saying "expression contains invalid value '2)'".

We now remove all whitespace from the expression which avoids the problem.

message: Cleanup/fix in the expression parser

Fixed: handling of exceptions during evaluation

If an exception occured during evaluation then the external viewer was
not attached to the query. This is now fixed.

title: Now using WolframAlpha to evaluate unit conversion
message:
Now using WolframAlpha to evaluate unit conversion

WolframAlpha seems to cover many more interesting expressions than Google, e.g.

(95 + 5) * ((convert km to m)/(convert m to s)) / 16

title: Added: deleting of individual query results
message:
Added: deleting of individual query results

This does not work yet for elements of ambiguous queries.

title: The results list can be now sorted
message:
The results list can be now sorted

by

  * timestamp (default) (newest first),
  * input expression (alphabetically, A->Z),
  * evaluation result (numerically, largest first).

The evaluation result is a REAL (in case of unit conversion and arithmetical expressions) or NULL (in case of addresses).

title: Minor refactoring
message: Minor refactoring

title: Added: support for doing Google Maps queries.
message:
Added: support for doing Google Maps queries.

A bit hackish at the moment.

title: General improvements:
message:
General improvements:

  * Replaced Unitconv-grammar with the Calc-grammar which additionally supports arithmetical expressions
  * Now using MathEval.java to parse arithmetical expressions
  (see: http://www.softwaremonkey.org/Code/MathEval)
  * For the recognizer service we now require ee.ioc.phon.android.recognizerintent,
  previously any RecognizerIntent.ACTION_RECOGNIZE_SPEECH could be used.
  The reason is that ee.ioc.phon.android.recognizerintent is the only recognizer in
  the world that we are aware of that supports Estoonian language and JSGF-based recognition.

title: Minor bug fixes.
message: Minor bug fixes.

title: Several improvements:
message:
Several improvements:

  * Estonian localization
  * tapping on a result item item now triggers Google search, e.g. you can use it to convert expression like "10 NOK in EEK" which the internal converter does not support
  * new icon
  * some UI fixes
  * now removing white space from the unit symbols

message: Some UI improvements

Plugged in the unit conversion (using jscience-4.3)

Also various improvements to the UI, documentation, code readability.

title: Now has a microphone button ...
message:
Now has a microphone button ...

which calls the speech recognition service using the UnitconvEst-grammar.

title: Added a simple Android app which is based on the JPGF Android Tutorial.
message:
Added a simple Android app which is based on the JPGF Android Tutorial.

See the tutorial: http://www.grammaticalframework.org/android/tutorial/

There are only minor changes compared to the source code of the tutorial.
E.g., instead of the Foods-grammar we use our own Unitconv-grammar.
